{{include reference="EESCCode.ShareMacro" /}} {{velocity}} #* * EESC share a project * ----- * * This page propose to share or change existing rights of an existing project. * * Author: Fabio MANCINELLI * Jean SIMARD *# ############################################## ## GLOBALS ############################################## ## HTTP REQUEST PARAMETERS #set($reqStep = $request.getParameter('step')) #if($request.getParameter('cancel')) #set($reqStep = 'cancel') #end #set($reqReferer = $request.getParameter('referer')) #if(!$reqReferer) #set($reqReferer = $request.getHeader('referer')) #end #set($reqProjectName = $request.getParameter('projectname')) #set($reqScope = $request.getParameter('scope')) #set($reqUsers = $request.getParameterValues('users')) #set($reqGroups = $request.getParameterValues('groups')) ############################################## ## CONTROLLER ############################################## #controller() #macro(controller) #if($reqStep.equals('cancel')) #stepCancel($reqReferer) #elseif($reqStep.equals('form') && $reqProjectName) #stepForm($reqProjectName) #elseif($reqStep.equals('share') && $reqProjectName) #stepShare($reqProjectName, $reqScope, $reqUsers, $reqGroups) #else #displayError() #end #end ############################################## ## ADD DATA ############################################## #* * Share the project * ----- * * Given the HTTP POST request, change the project rights. * * @param $projectName The name of the project to create * @param $scope The type of restriction of the project ('public', 'shared' or 'private') * @param $users The list of authorized users if it apply (if $scope is 'shared') * @param $groups The list of authorized users if it apply (if $scope is 'shared') *# #macro(stepShare, $projectName, $scope, $users, $groups) #set($projectref = $services.model.createDocumentReference(${xcontext.mainWikiName}, $spaceName, $projectName)) #set($project = $xwiki.getDocument($projectref)) #set($shareobj = $project.getObject('EESCCode.CollaborativeProjectClass')) #set($discard = $shareobj.set('scope', $scope)) #set($discard = $project.removeObjects('XWiki.XWikiRights')) ## Rights of the creator #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $project.creator)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit,delete,creator')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #if($scope.equals('public')) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', 'XWiki.XWikiAllGroup')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #elseif($scope.equals('shared')) ## Rights for the users #foreach($username in $users) #set($user = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($username))) #if($user.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiUsers') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $username)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end ## Rights for the groups #foreach($groupname in $groups) #set($group = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($groupname))) #if($group.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiGroups') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', $groupname)) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end #end #set($discard = $project.save()) #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($projectref, 'view', ''))) #end ############################################## ##
